page.title: 05SPORTS CLUBS LOWER PENARTH
page.content: In the area there are several{private {sports clubs}catering for golf,rugby squash,tennis and bowls.Glamorganshire {Golf}Club,founded in 1890,is heavily subscribed taking its members from Penarth and Cardiff.The record of 65, for the 18-hole course held by{Tony {Jacklin,}made in 1969.Private tennis and bowls facilities are located at {Windsor Tennis and Bowls Clubs.}The bowling greens and tennis courts are all outdoors.Some tennis courts are grass,some hard court and 4 new all- weather courts are being prepared.Club house and changing-room facilities are found at the Windsor complex.A popular club,the{Old Penarthians}offers the following leisure activities:-senior rugby teams,squash,darts,crib,pool,and weight training.A sucessful annual event is the{Old Penarthians' 7-a-side rugby tournament in May.
